name: Subway
long_description: You find yourself in a cavernous space completely covered in pale tile, giving your footsteps a sweet-sounding echo. Excessive greenish fluorescent lighting floods the space and saps the color from the mostly organic stains on the ground and walls. A dense rumble precedes the arrival of each subway, which greets you with an unintelligible squawking of multilingual vowels and jingles. A much abuse trashcan cowers in the far corner. To one side a phone booth advertises the city's best psychic and liquor delivery services. Some turnstiles are in place to collect your fare before traveling to other areas.
short_description: An underground transport system complete with garbage receptacle and touch tone communication interface.

room_features.name: Phone Booth
room_features.description: People have probably wasted a lot of money in this broke down Phone Booth.

room_features.name: Trash Can
room_features.description: One's trash is another's treasure, right?

room_features.name: Turnstiles
room_features.description: These turnstiles are somehow impossible to jump over. A slot designed for accepting fare payments sits to one side, and an access port looks like it would interface with a standard USB cable.
room_features.description_hacked: The turnstiles have been overridden by your h4cking skillz. You can are able to walk through without paying a dime.

room_connections.label: Street
room_connections.description: the door heading outside to the Street

room_connections.label: Arcade
room_connections.description: an exciting sign for an arcade
